title: Looking for a partner in crime
body:
Looking for someone to duo with IDC what your rank is , all i want is a fun and smart player who doesnt cost the team the game, IGN - Mullyplant94 

Anytime from now will be good, ( im in a game atm tho ) and i would prefer to be able to skype or someshit for better communication and also more fun

Let me know ASAP and help someone stuck in bronze find his way out,

replies.body: Jump on http://RetreatHellGaming.com we have plenty of New Zealand and Aussie players wanting to make ranked teams.
